name: Ninja Frog (itch) (Pranjal malik)
description:
Controls

Arrow Keys to move. You have 3 lives before you get reset to the beginning.

My First Project

Ninja Frog is my first project, and I would like to thank you for taking your time and playing through it. There might be a few bugs but Enjoy!

Credits 

Thanks to Pixel Frog for the assets! I did all programming :)

Future Updates

No plans for now but maybe Ill add and an end menu and downloadable build!
